text.0: the thirty gods and three besides whose seat hath been the sacred grass.
text.1: from time of old have found and gained.
text.2: varuṇa mitra aryaman agnis with consorts sending boons.
text.3: to whom our vaṣaṭ is addressed.
text.4: these are our guardians in the west and northward here and in the south.
text.5: and on the cast with all the tribe.
text.6: even as the gods desire so verily shall it be none minisheth this power of theirs.
text.8: the seven carry seven spears seven are the splendours they possess.
text.9: and seven the glories they assume.
